# Fetch some prices
```{r}
system("make")
files = list.files(path = "tmp", pattern = "*.json", full.names = TRUE)
print(files)
```

# Let's munge some JSON
```{r}
library("rjson")
raw = fromJSON(file = files[5])

prices = list()
for (observation in raw$Data) prices = rbind.data.frame(prices, observation)

summary(unlist(prices$close))

plot(prices$time, prices$close)
```

# FFT
```{r}
f = fft(prices$open - prices$close)
matplot(f, pch = 1)
```
```{r}
f = fft(prices$high - prices$low)
plot(f, pch = 1)
matplot(sapply(f, abs), pch = 1)
```
